Get latest articles and stories on India at LatestLY.   The COVID-19 tally of Andaman
  and Nicobar Islands rose to 4,667 on Wednesday as 11 more
people tested positive for the infection, a health official
said.
articles.content:
Port Blair, Nov 25 (PTI) The COVID-19 tally of Andaman and Nicobar Islands rose to 4,667 on Wednesday as 11 more people tested positive for the infection, a health official said.

articles.title: More Fun Than Fun: Experienced Ants Lead and Teach, Naïve Ants Follow and Learn - The Wire Science
articles.description: Many ants, especially those that live in small colonies, communicate without trail pheromones. Instead, they use tandem-running.
